short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add extra keyboard functionalities when playing The Crypto Prophecies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When playing The Crypto Prophecies game it is important to use the items as fast as possible.
The extension provides extra keyboard options:
1. Press A -> Loop 1 every 20 milliseconds
2. Press S -> Stop looping 1
3. Press D -> Loop 2 every 20 milliseconds
4. Press F -> Stop looping 2
